synopsis.text: Mini anime series, "Petit Sekai" (Puchi Seka), inspired by the popular smartphone rhythm game, Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku, has been given the green light! Produced by Sega, this chibi-style adaptation will delight viewers with a comedic twist on the original game's atmosphere. The 10-episode series will stream for free on YouTube, as announced during the 'Project Sekai Anniversary Festa 2021' event. Join Miku Hatsune, Len Kagamine, and their friends as they navigate through their everyday lives in this must-see spin-off!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
